") end -- local x = gmcp.room.info.map.x -- local y = gmcp.room.info.map.y -- local z = 0 -- local area = gmcp.room.info.map.name -- local domain = gmcp.room.info.map.domain -- -- -- Because map (0, 0) is in top-left corner -- y = -y -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then roomChg.printRoomData(x, y, area, domain) end -- -- -- Add area -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding area
") end -- local areaName = domain.. ":" .. area .. ":Known" -- areaName = globalFunctions.deleteWhiteSpaces(areaName) -- local areaId = roomChg.AddArea(areaName) -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("areaId = " .. areaId .. "
") end -- -- Add room -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding room
") end -- local roomId = roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomId = " .. roomId .. "
") end -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Centering view
") end -- mmp.centerView(roomId) -- -- -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- -- __LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__ = roomId -- -- -- --Delete old stubs -- mmp.deleteAllStubs(roomId) -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Adding visible exits
") end -- mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId) -- -- if __IS_CONNECTING_STUBS__ == true then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Connecting exit stubs
") end -- roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("roomChg -> addKnownRoom -> stubs connected.
") end -- else -- mmp.connectLastReverse(roomId) -- end -- -- -- -- --__LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- -- --__LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ -- --__CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId -- -- return true --end -- --function roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- local roomId = mmp.addRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>View centered") end -- __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ -- __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- -- __LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ -- __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId -- return roomId --end -- --function roomChg.AddArea(areaName) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> Start
") end -- local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName) -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> check if is nil
") end -- if (areaId == nil) then -- areaId = mmp.addArea(areaName) -- end -- -- if (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (areaId ~= nil) then cecho("<yellow>areaId = " .. areaId .. "
") end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> Add Area -> returning id = " .. areaId .. "
") end -- return areaId --end -- --function roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) -- mmp.connectExitStubs(roomId) --end -- --function roomChg.updateLastLocation() -- __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ -- __LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ -- --setRoomEnv(__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.envColors.default) --end -- --function roomChg.printRoomData(x, y, area, domain) -- cecho("<yellow>x = " .. x .. "
") -- cecho("<yellow>y = " .. y .. "
") -- cecho("<yellow>area = " .. area .. "
") -- cecho("<yellow>domain = " .. domain .. "
") -- -- if __LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>LastRoomId = nil
") end -- return -- end -- -- if __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>CurrentRoomId = nil
") end; -- return -- end -- --end -- --function roomChg.connectPrevToCurrent() -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Start 
") end -- local lastCommand = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Last move command read 
") end -- if (not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCommand)) or (lastCommand == nil) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> No exit map for this command. Returning. 
") end -- return false -- end -- -- if (__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil) or (__LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Room id == false. Returning. 
") end -- return false -- end -- -- local gmcpExits = __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ -- local isConnected = false -- -- if (gmcpExits == nil) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> no gmcp exits. Returning 
") end -- return false -- end -- -- -- -- This will work only if there was gmpc exit specified. If there was none, it will just return. -- if (__IS_CONNECT_KNOWN_GMCP_ONLY__) and (not table.contains(gmcpExits, lastCommand)) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> no gmcp exits. Returning 
") end -- return -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then -- echo("

Creating one way connection.
") -- echo("From room " .. __LAST_ROOM_ID__ .. " to " .. __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ .. " direction: " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. "
") -- cecho("<yellow>Dir " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. " <=> " .. lastCommand .. "
") -- end -- -- isConnected = mmp.connectFromTo(__LAST_ROOM_ID__, __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.exitmap[lastCommand]) -- -- -- if (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (isConnected == true) then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Connection created
") -- elseif (__IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true) and (isConnected == false) then echo("roomChg -> connectPrevToCurrent -> Connection not created
") end -- --end -- --function roomChg.addUnknownRoomGMCP() -- -- if gmcp.room.info.map ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> addUnknownRoomGMCP ->> Map info present. Returning.
") end -- return false -- end -- -- if gmcp.room.info == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> addUnknownRoomGMCP ->No GMCP location data. Returning.
") end -- return false -- end -- -- --local lastCmd = __LAST_COMMAND__ -- local lastCmd = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) -- if not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCmd) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> addUnknownRoomGMCP -> Command not valid. Returning
") end -- return false -- end -- -- --cecho("<yellow>Last move command = " .. __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ .. "
") -- local x, y, z = roomChg.modifyCoords(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) -- -- -- Like: Imperium:Parravon:Known -- local areaName = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__)) -- areaName, _ = string.gsub(areaName, ":Known$", ":Out") -- local areaId = roomChg.AddArea(areaName) -- local roomId = roomChg.AddRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- mmp.centerView(roomId) -- mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId) -- --roomChg.connectStubs(roomId) -- don't automatically connect stubs -- roomChg.connectOut() -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- return true --end -- --function roomChg.modifyCoords(cmd) -- -- -- local x = __LAST_POS_X__ -- local y = __LAST_POS_Y__ -- local z = __LAST_POS_Z__ -- -- if mmp.dirN[cmd] then -- y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirNE[cmd] then -- x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ -- y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirNW[cmd] then -- x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ -- y = y + __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirE[cmd] then -- x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirW[cmd] then -- x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirS[cmd] then -- y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirSE[cmd] then -- x = x + __AREA_SIZE__ -- y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirSW[cmd] then -- x = x - __AREA_SIZE__ -- y = y - __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirUp[cmd] then -- z = z + __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirDown[cmd] then -- z = z - __AREA_SIZE__ -- elseif mmp.dirOut[cmd] then -- x = x + __AREA_WIDTH_OFFSET__ -- elseif mmp.dirIn[cmd] then -- x = x - __AREA_WIDTH_OFFSET__ -- end -- -- return x, y, z --end -- --function roomChg.clearCmdList() -- __CMD_LIST__ = nil -- __CMD_LIST__ = List.new() --end -- --function roomChg.assignLastMoveCommand() -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> assignLastMoveCommand -> start
") end -- if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then -- return -- end -- -- --if next(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) == nil then -- if table.size(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) < 3 then -- __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = nil -- return -- end -- -- if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__.first > __MOVE_CMD_LIST__.last then -- __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = nil -- return -- end -- -- __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ = List.popleft(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> assignLastMoveCommand -> popleft -> " .. __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ .. "
") end --end -- --function roomChg.writeExits() -- --if not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, cmd) then return end -- local exits = gmcp.room.info.exits -- if exits == nil then -- __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ = nil -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<yellow>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually
<reset>") end -- return -- end -- __LAST_ROOM_EXITS__ = exits -- --end -- --function roomChg.updatePosition() -- local map = gmcp.room.info.map -- -- if map == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("roomChg -> updatePosition -> Location unknown (no GMPC)
") end -- return false -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> updatePosition -> Location known (GMCP received)
") end -- local x = gmcp.room.info.map.x -- local y = gmcp.room.info.map.y -- local z = 0 -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("roomChg -> updatePosition -> x = " .. x .. ", y = " .. y .. ", z = " .. z .. "
") end -- -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = -y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- -- return true --end -- --function roomChg.connectOut() -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Last move command: " .. __LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__ .. "
") end -- local lastCommand = mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) -- if (not table.contains(mmp.exitmap, lastCommand)) or (lastCommand == nil) then -- return false -- end -- -- if (__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil) or (__LAST_ROOM_ID__ == nil) then -- return false -- end -- -- local isConnected = false -- -- isConnected = mmp.connectFromTo(__LAST_ROOM_ID__, __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__, mmp.exitmap[lastCommand]) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then -- echo("

Creating one way connection.
") -- echo("From room " .. __LAST_ROOM_ID__ .. " to " .. __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ .. " direction: " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. "
") -- echo("Dir " .. mmp.exitmap[lastCommand] .. " <=> " .. lastCommand .. "
") -- end -- --end -- --function roomChg.saveCurrentRoomData(roomId, areaId) -- __LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__ = roomId -- __LAST_ROOM_ID__ = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ -- __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- -- __LAST_AREA_ID__ = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ -- __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ = areaId --end -- --function roomChg.hasTrackedSpecialExit() -- -- If there is special exit equal to last command -- if __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ == nil then return false end -- -- local spExits = getSpecialExits(__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__) -- -- if table.is_empty(spExits) then return false end -- -- if table.contains(spExits, __LAST_COMMAND__) then -- -- Set new room coordinates as current -- local newRoomId = nil -- for exitRoomId,num in pairs(spExits) do -- if table.contains(spExits[exitRoomId], __LAST_COMMAND__) then -- newRoomId = exitRoomId -- break -- end -- end -- -- if newRoomId == nil then -- cecho("<red>roomChg -> hasTrackedSpecialExit() -> room == nil") -- return false -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> hasTrackedSpecialExit -> before getRoomCoordinates
") end -- -- --mmp.centerView(newRoomId) -- local x,y,z = getRoomCoordinates(newRoomId) -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- -- mmp.centerView(newRoomId) -- local areaId = getRoomArea(newRoomId) -- roomChg.saveCurrentRoomData(newRoomId, areaId) -- -- if __IS_ROUTES_FEEDBACK__ == true then -- mmp.showRoutes(newRoomId) -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> hasTrackedSpecialExit -> Moved through special exit
") end -- -- return true -- moved through special exit -- end -- return false -- -- TODO: add separate queue for special exits possibly --end -- --function roomChg.trackPosition() -- if __IS_AUTOMAPPER_ON__ == true then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Automapper is on. Returning. 
") end -- end -- -- local areaName = nil -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Updating position 
") end -- -- local hasUpdatedGMCP = roomChg.updatePosition() -- if hasUpdatedGMCP == true then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Area known. Updating areaName. 
") end -- areaName = roomChg.getKnownAreaName() -- else -- local x, y, z = roomChg.modifyCoords(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__) -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Area out. Updating areaName 
") end -- --areaName = roomChg.getOutAreaName() -- end -- -- if areaName == nil then -- areaName = roomChg.getOutAreaName() -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Getting area and room ids 
") end -- -- local roomId = nil -- local exits -- local areaId = mmp.getAreaId(areaName) -- -- -- If there is a current room, we can check it's exits or we can use gmpc data is any -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> checking exits table 
") end -- --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = " .. __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ .. "
") end -- if hasUpdatedGMCP == false and __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ ~= nil then--and gmcp.room.info.map == nil then -- exits = getRoomExits(__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__) -- -- local lastCommand = mmp.exitmap[mmp.exitmap[mmp.commandToExit(__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__)]] -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> lastCommand = " .. lastCommand .. "
") end -- if table.contains(exits, lastCommand) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> roomId from exits table 
") end -- roomId = exits[lastCommand] -- end -- end -- -- if roomId == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> roomId from (x, y, z) 
") end -- roomId = mmp.getRoomId(areaId, __LAST_POS_X__, __LAST_POS_Y__, __LAST_POS_Z__) -- else -- -- Room coordinates may differ because of manual room addition -- local x, y, z = getRoomCoordinates(roomId) -- __LAST_POS_X__ = x -- __LAST_POS_Y__ = y -- __LAST_POS_Z__ = z -- end -- -- -- --local areaId = mmp.getAreaId(areaName) -- --roomId = mmp.getRoomId(areaId, __LAST_POS_X__, __LAST_POS_Y__, __LAST_POS_Z__) -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Centering the view 
") end -- if roomId ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> roomId = " .. roomId .. "
") end -- mmp.centerView(roomId) -- roomChg.saveCurrentRoomData(roomId, areaId) -- -- if __IS_ROUTES_FEEDBACK__ == true then -- mmp.showRoutes(roomId) -- mmp.printNotes(roomId) -- end -- else -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Error: Room id = nil. Returning 
") end -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> Room id won't be changed 
") end -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = nil -- --__CURRENT_AREA_ID_ = nil -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> trackPosition -> End. 
") end --end -- --function roomChg.getKnownAreaName() -- local area = gmcp.room.info.map.name -- local domain = gmcp.room.info.map.domain -- -- local areaName = domain.. ":" .. area .. ":Known" -- areaName = globalFunctions.deleteWhiteSpaces(areaName) -- return areaName --end -- --function roomChg.getOutAreaName() -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("roomChg -> getOutAreaName -> Start. 
") end -- local areaName = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__)) -- areaName, _ = string.gsub(areaName, ":Known$", ":Out") -- return areaName --end -- --

Script.name: mapperScript
Script.script:
---- mapperScript ---- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. -- --------------------------------------------------- ---- Put your Lua functions here. -- ---- -- ---- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- --------------------------------------------------- --echo(debug.traceback()) -- ----mapper off --mudlet = mudlet or {}; mudlet.mapper_script = true -- ---- turn mapper off --mmp = mmp or {} -- --mmp.exitmap = { -- n = 1, -- north = 1, -- ne = 2, -- northeast = 2, -- nw = 3, -- northwest = 3, -- e = 4, -- east = 4, -- w = 5, -- west = 5, -- s = 6, -- south = 6, -- se = 7, -- southeast = 7, -- sw = 8, -- southwest = 8, -- u = 9, -- up = 9, -- d = 10, -- down = 10, -- ["in"] = 11, -- out = 12, -- [1] = "north", -- [2] = "northeast", -- [3] = "northwest", -- [4] = "east", -- [5] = "west", -- [6] = "south", -- [7] = "southeast", -- [8] = "southwest", -- [9] = "up", -- [10] = "down", -- [11] = "in", -- [12] = "out", -- --[1] = "polnoc", -- --[2] = "polnocny-wschod", -- --[3] = "polnocny-zachod", -- --[4] = "wschod", -- --[5] = "zachod", -- --[6] = "poludnie", -- --[7] = "poludniowy-wschod", -- --[8] = "poludniowy-zachod", -- --[9] = "gora", -- --[10] = "dol", -- --[11] = "wejscie", -- --[12] = "wyjscie", -- ["polnoc"] = 1, -- ["polnocny-wschod"] = 2, -- ["polnocny-zachod"] = 3, -- ["wschod"] = 4, -- ["zachod"] = 5, -- ["poludnie"] = 6, -- ["poludniowy-wschod"] = 7, -- ["poludniowy-zachod"] = 8, -- ["g"] = 9, -- ["gora"] = 9, -- ["d"] = 10, -- ["dol"] = 10, -- ["wejscie"] = 11, -- ["wyjscie"] = 12, --} -- --mmp.exitShortMap = { -- ["north"] = "n", -- ["northeast"] = "ne", -- ["northwest"] = "nw", -- ["east"] = "e", -- ["west"] = "w", -- ["south"] = "s", -- ["southeast"] = "se", -- ["southwest"] = "sw", -- ["up"] = "gora", -- ["down"] = "dol", -- ["in"] = "wejscie", -- ["out"] = "wyjscie", --} -- --mmp.exitmapReversed = { -- [1] = "south", -- [2] = "southwest", -- [3] = "southeast", -- [4] = "west", -- [5] = "east", -- [6] = "north", -- [7] = "northwest", -- [8] = "northeast", -- [9] = "down", -- [10] = "up", -- [11] = "out", -- [12] = "in", --} -- --mmp.dirN = Set { "polnoc", "n" } --mmp.dirNE = Set { "polnocny-wschod", "ne" } --mmp.dirE = Set { "wschod", "e" } --mmp.dirSE = Set { "poludniowy-wschod", "se" } --mmp.dirS = Set { "poludnie", "s" } --mmp.dirSW = Set { "poludniowy-zachod", "sw" } --mmp.dirW = Set { "zachod", "w" } --mmp.dirNW = Set { "polnocny-zachod", "nw" } --mmp.dirUp = Set { "gora", "g", "wejdz po drabinie", "wespnij sie na gore", "wespnij sie na most", "wejdz na most"} --mmp.dirDown = Set { "dol", "d", "jaskinia", "zejdz po drabinie", "zejdz na dol", "zejdz pod most"} --mmp.dirIn = Set { "wejscie", "wejdz do baraku" } --mmp.dirOut = Set { "wyjscie", "drzwi" } -- ----setCustomEnvColor(300, 100,100,100,255) ----setRoomEnv(roomId, 300) --mmp.envColors = { -- connection = 300, -- default = 301, -- forest = 302, -- water = 303, -- town = 304, -- cave = 305, -- fountain = 306, -- meadow = 307, -- sand = 308, -- harbor = 309, -- stone = 310, -- blacksmith = 311, -- shop = 312, -- herbalist = 313, -- bank = 314, -- post = 315, -- tavern = 316, -- market = 317, -- auction = 318, -- gate = 319, -- bakery = 320, -- meditation = 321, -- secret = 322, -- order = 323, -- fish = 324, -- swamp = 324, -- jeweler = 325, -- ferry = 326, -- library = 327, -- ["connection"] = 300, -- ["default"] = 301, -- ["forest"] = 302, -- ["water"] = 303, -- ["town"] = 304, -- ["cave"] = 305, -- ["fountain"] = 306, -- ["meadow"] = 307, -- ["sand"] = 308, -- ["harbor"] = 309, -- ["stone"] = 310, -- ["blacksmith"] = 311, -- ["shop"] = 312, -- ["herbalist"] = 313, -- ["bank"] = 314, -- ["post"] = 315, -- ["tavern"] = 316, -- ["market"] = 317, -- ["auction"] = 318, -- ["gate"] = 319, -- ["bakery"] = 320, -- ["meditation"] = 321, -- ["secret"] = 322, -- ["order"] = 323, -- ["fish"] = 324, -- ["swamp"] = 324, -- ["jeweler"] = 325, -- ["ferry"] = 326, -- ["library"] = 327, --} -- --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.default, 40,40,40,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.forest, 0,85,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.water, 0,0,200,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.town, 100,0,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.cave, 140,140,140,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.fountain, 60,120,205,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.meadow, 34,139,34,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.sand, 218,165,32,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.harbor, 112,138,144,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.stone, 105,105,105,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.blacksmith, 170,85,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.shop, 139,0,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.herbalist, 0,128,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.bank, 184,134,11,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.post, 0,0,128,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.tavern, 150,55,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.market, 178,34,34,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.auction, 139,0,139,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.gate, 100,0,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.bakery, 139,69,0,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.meditation, 75,0,130,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.secret, 128,0,128,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.order, 210,105,30,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.fish, 32,178,170,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.swamp, 79,120,47,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.jeweler, 218,165,32,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.ferry, 30,144,255,255) --setCustomEnvColor(mmp.envColors.library, 60,0,150,255) -- -- -- ----blacksmith, shop, bank, post, zielarz, dylizans, meditation, tavern, skup/targowisko(market), gates, auction house --mmp.roomMarks = { -- fountain = { mmp.envColors.fountain, "F" }, -- harbor = { mmp.envColors.harbor, "H" }, -- blacksmith = { mmp.envColors.blacksmith, "K" }, -- shop = { mmp.envColors.shop, "S" }, -- herbalist = { mmp.envColors.herbalist, "Z" }, -- bank = { mmp.envColors.bank, "B" }, -- post = { mmp.envColors.post, "P" }, -- tavern = { mmp.envColors.tavern, "T" }, -- market = { mmp.envColors.market, "m" }, -- auction = { mmp.envColors.auction, "A" }, -- gate = { mmp.envColors.auction, "G" }, -- bakery = { mmp.envColors.bakery, "B" }, -- meditation = { mmp.envColors.meditation, "M" }, -- secret = { mmp.envColors.secret, "*" }, -- order = { mmp.envColors.order, "O" }, -- fish = { mmp.envColors.fish, "r" }, -- jeweler = { mmp.envColors.jeweler, "J" }, -- ferry = { mmp.envColors.ferry, "S" }, -- library = { mmp.envColors.library, "L" }, -- ["fountain"] = { mmp.envColors.fountain, "F" }, -- ["harbor"] = { mmp.envColors.harbor, "H" }, -- ["blacksmith"] = { mmp.envColors.blacksmith, "K" }, -- ["shop"] = { mmp.envColors.shop, "S" }, -- ["herbalist"] = { mmp.envColors.herbalist, "Z" }, -- ["bank"] = { mmp.envColors.bank, "B" }, -- ["post"] = { mmp.envColors.post, "P" }, -- ["market"] = { mmp.envColors.market, "m" }, -- ["auction"] = { mmp.envColors.auction, "A" }, -- ["gate"] = { mmp.envColors.gate, "G" }, -- ["bakery"] = { mmp.envColors.bakery, "B" }, -- ["meditation"] = { mmp.envColors.meditation, "M" }, -- ["secret"] = { mmp.envColors.secret, "*" }, -- ["order"] = { mmp.envColors.order, "O" }, -- ["fish"] = { mmp.envColors.fish, "r" }, -- ["ferry"] = { mmp.envColors.ferry, "R" }, -- ["library"] = { mmp.envColors.library, "L" }, --} -- -- --local main = Geyser.Container:new({x=0,y=0,width="100%",height="100%",name="mapperContainer"}) -- --mmp.mapper = Geyser.Mapper:new({ -- name = "mapperScript.mapper", -- x = "70%", y = 0, -- edit here if you want to move it -- width = "30%", height = "50%" --}, main) -- --function mmp.addRoomWithId(areaId, roomId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> addRoom 
") end -- -- if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: area does not exist!
<reset>") end -- return false -- end -- -- if roomExists(roomId) == true then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: Room already exists!
<reset>") end -- return false -- end -- -- --roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- if next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId, x, y, z)) ~= nil then -- --if roomId ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room already exists!
<reset>") end -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- --roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) -- return roomId -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> RoomId = " .. roomId .. "
") end -- addRoom(roomId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room added
") end -- setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room created. Setting room area.
") end -- setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room area set
") end -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Room added.
<reset>") end -- return roomId --end -- ----specific ID --function mmp.addRoom(areaId, roomId, x, y, z) -- if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: area does not exist!
<reset>") end -- return false -- end -- -- -- --roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- if next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId, x, y, z)) ~= nil then -- --if roomId ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room already exists!
<reset>") end -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) -- return roomId -- end -- -- addRoom(roomId) -- setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) -- setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Room added.
<reset>") end -- return roomId --end -- -- ---- Generated id --function mmp.addRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Adding room 
") end -- if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: area does not exist!
<reset>") end -- return false -- end -- -- -- local roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- if roomId ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: room already exists!
<reset>") end -- --__CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ = roomId -- mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) -- return roomId -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Creating Id 
") end -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Coordinates = (" .. x .. ", " .. y .. ", " .. z .. ")
") end -- roomId = createRoomID() -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> RoomId = " .. roomId .. "
") end -- addRoom(roomId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room added
") end -- setRoomCoordinates(roomId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room created. Setting room area.
") end -- setRoomArea(roomId, areaId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> Room area set
") end -- -- mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Room added.
<reset>") end -- return roomId --end -- --function mmp.addArea(areaName) -- local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName) -- -- if areaId ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Error: " .. areaName .. " already exists!
<reset>") end -- return areaId -- end -- -- areaId = addAreaName(areaName) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<blue>Area added.
<reset>") end -- return areaId --end -- -- -- --function mmp.areaExists(areaId) -- if getAreaRooms(areaId) ~= nil then -- return true -- else -- return false -- end --end -- -- -- --function mmp.addVisibleExits(roomId) -- if gmcp.room.info.exits == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually
<reset>") end -- return -- end -- -- local exits = gmcp.room.info.exits -- -- if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-zachod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.nw, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "polnoc") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.n, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-wschod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.ne, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "wschod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.e, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-wschod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.se, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "poludnie") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.s, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-zachod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.sw, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "zachod") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.w, true) -- end -- -- -- up and down stubs dont work on the known map (z == 0) -- if table.contains(exits, "dol") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.down, true) -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, "gora") then -- setExitStub(roomId, mmp.exitmap.up, true) -- end -- -- return true --end -- --function mmp.translateAreaExceptions(areaname) -- if areaname == "Imperium:Wissenland:Known" then -- return "Imperium:Wissenland_i_Sudenland:Known" -- end -- -- return areaname --end -- --function mmp.findAreaID(areaname) -- local list = getAreaTable() -- -- iterate over the list of areas, matching them with substring match. -- -- if we get match a single area, then return it's ID, otherwise return -- -- 'false' and a message that there are than one are matches -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> findAreaID -> table received
") end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> findAreaID -> old areaname = " .. areaname .. "
") end -- areaname = mmp.translateAreaExceptions(areaname) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> findAreaID -> new areaname = " .. areaname .. "
") end -- -- local returnid, fullareaname -- for area, id in pairs(list) do -- if area:find(areaname, 1, true) then -- if returnid then return false, "more than one area matches" end -- returnid = id; fullareaname = area -- end -- end -- -- return returnid, fullareaname --end -- --function mmp.centerView(roomId) -- centerview(roomId) --end -- --function mmp.connectExitStubs(roomId) -- local exits = getRoomExits(roomId) -- local stubs = getExitStubs(roomId) -- if (type(stubs)) ~= "table" then return end -- if stubs then -- for i,v in pairs(stubs) do -- connectExitStub(roomId, v) -- end -- end --end -- --function mmp.connectLastReverse(roomId) -- local stubs = getExitStubs(roomId) -- if (type(stubs)) ~= "table" then return end -- -- local lastMoveNo = mmp.exitmap[__LAST_MOVE_COMMAND__] -- if lastMoveNo == nil then return end -- local lastMoveReversedDir = mmp.exitmapReversed[lastMoveNo] -- local lastMoveReversedDirNo = mmp.exitmap[lastMoveReversedDir] -- -- if table.contains(stubs, mmp.exitmap[lastMoveReversedDir]) then -- mmp.connectFromTo(roomId, __LAST_ROOM_ID__, lastMoveReversedDirNo) -- end --end -- --function mmp.deleteAllStubs(roomId) -- local exitStubs = getExitStubs(roomId) -- if type(exitStubs) ~= "table" then return end -- for i,v in pairs(exitStubs) do -- setExitStub(roomId, v,false) -- end --end -- --function mmp.connectFromTo(fromId, toId, directionNo) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Start
") end -- if (fromId == nil) or (toId == nil) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> from or to == nil. Returning.
") end -- return false -- end -- -- local exits = getRoomExits(fromId) -- if exits == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> exits == nil. Returning
") end -- return false -- end -- -- if table.contains(exits, mmp.exitmap[directionNo]) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> exit already exists. Returning
") end -- return false -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Adding exit
") end -- -- -- -- Check if there is already connection from fromId to toId -- if mmp.isConnected(fromId, toId) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> connectFromTo -> Rooms are already connected. Returning
") end -- -- return false -- end -- return setExit(fromId, toId, directionNo) --end -- --function mmp.isConnected(fromId, toId) -- -- local exits = getRoomExits(fromId) -- for direction,num in pairs(exits) do -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> isConnected -> Checking direction = " .. direction .. ", and num = " .. num .. "
") end -- if num == toId then return true end -- end -- -- return false --end -- --function mmp.addSpecialExit(roomFromId, roomToId, exitCommand) -- if gmcp.room.info.exits == nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no GMCP map data. Try to add exits manually
<reset>") end -- return -- end -- -- if roomExists(roomFromId) == false or roomExists(roomToId) == false then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then cecho("<red>There is no romm with a given id
<reset>") end -- end -- -- addSpecialExit(roomFromId, roomToId, exitCommand) --end -- --function mmp.commandToExit(cmd) -- if mmp.dirN[cmd] then return "polnoc" -- elseif mmp.dirNE[cmd] then return "polnocny-wschod" -- elseif mmp.dirNW[cmd] then return "polnocny-zachod" -- elseif mmp.dirE[cmd] then return "wschod" -- elseif mmp.dirW[cmd] then return "zachod" -- elseif mmp.dirS[cmd] then return "poludnie" -- elseif mmp.dirSE[cmd] then return "poludniowy-wschod" -- elseif mmp.dirSW[cmd] then return "poludniowy-zachod" -- elseif mmp.dirUp[cmd] then return "gora" -- elseif mmp.dirDown[cmd] then return "dol" -- elseif mmp.dirOut[cmd] then return "wyjscie" -- elseif mmp.dirIn[cmd] then return "wejscie" -- else return nil -- end --end -- --function mmp.setRoomEnvColor(roomId) -- if __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ == nil then -- __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ = mmp.envColors.default -- end -- -- if __IS_PAINTING_ON__ then -- -- if mmp.hasMark(roomId) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> setRoomEnvColor -> Room is marked. Returning
") end -- return -- end -- -- setRoomEnv(roomId, __CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__) -- else -- if not table.contains(mmp.envColors, getRoomEnv(roomId)) then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ then echo("mmp -> setRoomEnvColor -> env not recognized. Changing to default
") end -- setRoomEnv(roomId, mmp.envColors.default) -- end -- end --end -- --function mmp.hasMark(roomId) -- local roomChar = getRoomChar(roomId or 0) -- if (roomChar == "") or (roomChar == "_") then -- return false -- else -- return true -- end --end -- --function mmp.markRoom(roomId, mark) -- --__CURRENT_ENV_COLOR__ = mmp.envColors[color] -- local envColor = mmp.roomMarks[mark][1] -- --echo("Room color = " .. mmp.roomMarks[mark][1] .. "
") -- --echo("Room char = " .. mmp.roomMarks[mark][2] .. "
") -- local roomMark = mmp.roomMarks[mark][2] -- setRoomEnv(roomId, envColor) -- setRoomChar(roomId, roomMark) -- --end -- --function mmp.unmarkRoom(roomId) -- setRoomChar(roomId, "_") --end -- --function mmp.getRoomId(areaId, x, y, z) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> getRoomId -> Checking room id
") end -- if mmp.areaExists(areaId) == false then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>mmp -> getRoomId -> Error: area does not exist!
<reset>") end -- return false -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> getRoomId -> (areaId, x, y, z) = " .. "(" .. areaId .. ", " .. x .. ", " .. y .. ", " .. z .. ")
") end -- local roomId = select(2, next(getRoomsByPosition(areaId,x,y,z))) -- if roomId ~= nil then -- return roomId -- else -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("mmp -> getRoomId -> room id not found!
") end -- return nil -- end -- --end -- --function mmp.getAreaId(areaName) -- local areaId, fullName = mmp.findAreaID(areaName) -- return areaId --end -- --function mmp.addSpecialExitDir(currentRoomId, dir, exitCommand) -- local fromId = currentRoomId -- -- local exits = getRoomExits(fromId) -- --cecho("<yellow>Checkpoint 1
") -- if table.contains(exits, mmp.exitmap[dir]) then -- echo("Room in this direction already exists
") -- return -- end -- -- -- add room in direction dir -- local x, y, z = roomChg.modifyCoords(dir) -- -- local areaName = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(__LAST_KNOWN_ROOM__)) -- areaName, _ = string.gsub(areaName, ":Known$", ":Out") -- local areaId = roomChg.AddArea(areaName) -- -- -- --local areaId = __CURRENT_AREA_ID__ -- -- local roomToId = mmp.addRoom(areaId, x, y, z) -- -- -- add special exit from current room to the new room -- -- -- -- addSpecialExit(fromId, roomToId, exitCommand) --end -- -- --function mmp.getExitScript(roomId, dir) -- --room is the room id #, dir is the direction we are attempting -- local exitScript = getRoomUserData(roomId, "exitScript"..dir) -- if exitScript ~= "" then -- --assert(loadstring(exitScript)) () -- return exitScript -- else -- return nil -- end --end -- --function mmp.printExitScript(roomId, dir) -- --room is the room id #, dir is the direction we are attempting -- local exitScript = getRoomUserData(roomId, "exitScript"..dir) -- if exitScript ~= "" then -- cecho("<yellow>[" .. dir .. " -> " .. exitScript .. "]
") -- end --end -- --function mmp.invokeExitScript(exitScript) -- local commandTable = string.split(exitScript, ",") -- for k,v in ipairs(commandTable) do -- --echo("command " .. k .. ": " .. v .. "
") -- send(v) -- end --end -- --function mmp.showRoutes(roomId) -- local exits = getRoomExits(roomId) -- -- --local dir = nil -- --for direction,num in pairs(exits) do -- --echo("direction = " .. direction .. ", num = " .. num .. "
") -- --echo("direction = " .. mmp.exitShortMap[direction] .. ", num = " .. num .. "
") -- -- --dir = mmp.exitShortMap[direction] -- --if dir ~= nil then -- --mmp.printExitScript(roomId, dir) -- --end -- --end -- -- for long, short in pairs(mmp.exitShortMap) do -- mmp.printExitScript(roomId, short) -- end -- -- --end -- --function mmp.exitGo(dir) -- if __IS_ROUTES_ON__ == false then -- send(dir) -- return -- end -- -- local currentRoomId = __CURRENT_ROOM_ID__ -- if currentRoomId == nil then -- --echo("num walking -> current room id == nil
") -- send(dir) -- return -- end -- -- commandString = mmp.getExitScript(currentRoomId, dir) -- if commandString == nil then -- send(dir) -- --cecho("<yellow>getExitScript = nil. Returning
") -- return -- end -- -- --Show -- --mmp.printExitScript(currentRoomId, dir) -- -- -- Invoke -- mmp.invokeExitScript(commandString) --end -- --function mmp.printNotes(roomId) -- --room is the room id #, dir is the direction we are attempting -- local notes = getRoomUserData(roomId, "notes") -- if notes ~= "" then -- cecho("<purple>[notes: " .. notes .. "]
") -- end --end

Script.name: readLastCommand
Script.script:
---- readLastCommand ---- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. -- --------------------------------------------------- ---- Put your Lua functions here. -- ---- -- ---- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- --------------------------------------------------- -- --rLstCmd = rLstCmd or {} -- --function readLastCommand(_, command) -- rLstCmd.storeCommand(command) -- rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(command) --end -- --function rLstCmd.storeAsCommand(cmd) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("rLstCmd -> sotreAsCommand -> cmd = " .. cmd .. "
") end -- rLstCmd.storeCommand(cmd) -- rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(cmd) --end -- --function rLstCmd.storeCommand(cmd) -- __LAST_COMMAND__ = cmd --end -- ---- Add all commands sent from this location. Clears the queue when new locations is entered (roomChanged) --function rLstCmd.addCmdToQueue(cmd) -- if __CMD_LIST__ == nil then __CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end -- if __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then __MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end -- if __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ == nil then __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() end -- -- if (__IS_MAPPING_ON__ == true) and (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) > 2) then -- cecho("<yellow>Move will cause coherency lost. Aborting move command.
") -- denyCurrentSend() -- return -- end -- -- List.pushright(__CMD_LIST__, cmd) -- -- cmd = rLstCmd.filterHide(cmd) -- -- local moveCmd = mmp.commandToExit(cmd) -- if moveCmd ~= nil then -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Size before push = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "
") end -- List.pushright(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__, cmd) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<red>Size after push = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "
") end -- --rLstCmd.addQueued() -- --__MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ = __MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ + 1 -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Move command to be written = " .. moveCmd .. "
") end -- end -- -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then -- cecho("<yellow>Tmp list: 
") -- display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- cecho("<yellow>Real list: 
") -- display(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- end -- -- if (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) > 3 then -- cecho("<yellow>Coherency lost
") -- display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- end -- -- -- if coherency lost: -- --if (__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ ~= nil) and (type(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) == "table") then -- --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("rLstCmd -> addCmdToQueue -> coherency 1
") end -- --local numb = __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ -- --if (table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) > 4 then -- --if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then echo("rLstCmd -> addCmdToQueue -> Coherency lost, number = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "
") end -- --return -- --Add last element (like a stack) -- --List.pushright(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__, List.popright(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) -- --__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__ = List.new() -- --end -- --end --end -- --function rLstCmd.addQueued() -- -- queue waiting commands -- --echo("Adding command if " .. __MOVEMENT_QUEUED__ .. " is equal to 0
") -- if (not (__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__.first > __TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__.last)) then -- --cecho("<yellowList before: 
") -- --display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Size before pop = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "
") end -- List.pushright(__MOVE_CMD_LIST__, List.popleft(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__)) -- if __IS_DEBUG_ON__ == true then cecho("<yellow>Size after pop = " .. table.size(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) .. "
") end -- --cecho("<yellow>List after: 
") -- --display(__TMP_MOVE_CMD_LIST__) -- end --end -- --function rLstCmd.filterHide(cmd) -- local dir -- dir, _ = string.gsub(cmd, "^(przemknij sie na ", "") -- return dir --end

Script.name: List
Script.script: ----List --------------------------------------------------- ---- Put your Lua functions here. -- ---- -- ---- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- --------------------------------------------------- -- --List = List or {} --function List.new () -- return {first = 0, last = -1} --end -- --function List.pushleft (list, value) -- local first = list.first - 1 -- list.first = first -- list[first] = value --end -- --function List.pushright (list, value) -- local last = list.last + 1 -- list.last = last -- list[last] = value --end -- --function List.popleft (list) -- local first = list.first -- if first > list.last then error("list is empty") end -- local value = list[first] -- list[first] = nil -- to allow garbage collection -- list.first = first + 1 -- return value --end -- --function List.popright (list) -- local last = list.last -- if list.first > last then error("list is empty") end -- local value = list[last] -- list[last] = nil -- to allow garbage collection -- list.last = last - 1 -- return value --end

Script.name: chasingReset
Script.script:
-- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober.
------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- -------------------------------------------------
function chasingReset() __IS_CHASING__ = false __IS_FOLLOWING__ = false end

Script.name: compassScript
Script.script:
-- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- compass = compass or {} compass.dirs = {"polnocny-zachod", "polnoc", "polnocny-wschod"} compass.back = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.back", x = "-30%", y = "35%", width = "10%", height = "10%", }, main) -- Create 3x3 grid compass.box = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "compass.box", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },compass.back) compass.row1 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row1", },compass.box) compass.row2 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row2", },compass.box) compass.row3 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "compass.row3", },compass.box) -- Add 9 labels for every compass direction compass.msgFormatLeft = "
" compass.msgFormaRight = "
" compass.nw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.nw", --message = " " .. compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. compass.msgFormaRight .. " ", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.w = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.w", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "W" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.sw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.sw", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "SW" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row1) compass.n = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.n", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "N" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row2) compass.center = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.center", },compass.row2) compass.s = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.s", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "S" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row2) compass.ne = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.ne", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "NE" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) compass.e = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.e", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "E" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) compass.se = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "compass.se", message = compass.msgFormatLeft .. "SE" .. compass.msgFormaRight, },compass.row3) function compass.refreshLabels() local exits = gmcp.room.info.exits if exits == nil then compass:nwOff() compass:nOff() compass:neOff() compass:eOff() compass:seOff() compass:sOff() compass:swOff() compass:wOff() return end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-zachod") then compass:nwOn() else compass:nwOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnoc") then compass:nOn() else compass:nOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-wschod") then compass:neOn() else compass:neOff() end if table.contains(exits, "wschod") then compass:eOn() else compass:eOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-wschod") then compass:seOn() else compass:seOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludnie") then compass:sOn() else compass:sOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-zachod") then compass:swOn() else compass:swOff() end if table.contains(exits, "zachod") then compass:wOn() else compass:wOff() end end function compassScript() compass:resize() compass:refreshLabels() end function compass.resize() compass.back:resize(compass.back:get_height(),compass.back:get_height()) end -- set styles compass.borderWidth = "1px;" compass.borderStyle = "solid;" compass.borderRadius = "1px;" compass.bgOnColor = "rgba(90,90,90,100%);" compass.borderOnColor = "rgba(120,120,120,100%);" compass.bgOffColor = "rgba(30,30,30,100%);" compass.borderOffColor = "rgba30,30,30,100%);" compass.styleOn = [[ background-color: ]] .. compass.bgOnColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. compass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. compass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. compass.borderOnColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. compass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] compass.styleOff = [[ background-color: ]] .. compass.bgOffColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. compass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. compass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. compass.borderOffColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. compass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] -- On ------------------------------------ function compass.nwOn() --compass.n:setColor(0, 255, 0) compass.nw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) --compass.nw:echo("NW", nil, "c") end function compass.nOn() compass.n:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) --compass.n:echo("N", nil, "c") end function compass.neOn() compass.ne:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.eOn() compass.e:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.seOn() compass.se:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.sOn() compass.s:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.swOn() compass.sw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end function compass.wOn() compass.w:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOn) end -- Off ------------------------------------ function compass.nwOff() compass.nw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.nOff() compass.n:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.neOff() compass.ne:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.eOff() compass.e:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.seOff() compass.se:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.sOff() compass.s:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.swOff() compass.sw:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end function compass.wOff() compass.w:setStyleSheet(compass.styleOff) end

Script.name: statusBarsScript
Script.script:
-- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- -- poziomy: -- kondycja (hp): (0, 6) -> 7 -- -- mana (mana): (0,8) -> 9 -- -- zmeczenie (fatigue): (0, 9) -> 10 -- -- obciazenie(encumbrance): (0, 5) -> 6 -- -- panika (panic): (0, 5) -> 6 -- -- glod (stuffed): (0, 3)-> 4 -- -- pragnienie (soaked) (0, 3) -> 4 -- -- upicie (intox): (0, 9) -> 10 -- kac (headache): (0, 5) -> 6 -- postepy (improve): (0, 16) -> 17 statusBars = statusBars or {} __STATUS_BARS_COLORFULL__ = false statusBars.back = Geyser.Container:new({ name = "statusBars.back", x = "-30%", y = "47%", width = "28%", height = "30%", }, main) -- Create box for the bars statusBars.box = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "statusBars.box", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },statusBars.back) -- Add bars statusBars.hpBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.hpBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.manaBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.manaBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.fatigueBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.fatigueBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.encumbranceBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.encumbranceBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.panicBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.panicBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.stuffedBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.stuffedBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.soakedBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.soakedBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.intoxBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.intoxBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.headacheBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.headacheBar", }, statusBars.box) statusBars.improveBar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="statusBars.improveBar", }, statusBars.box) -- Add Labels statusBars.labelTextColor = "white" statusBars.hpLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.hpLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.hpBar) statusBars.hpLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.manaLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.manaLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.manaBar) statusBars.manaLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.fatigueLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.fatigueLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.fatigueBar) statusBars.fatigueLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.encumbranceLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.encumbranceLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.encumbranceBar) statusBars.encumbranceLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.panicLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.panicLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.panicBar) statusBars.panicLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.stuffedLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.stuffedLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.stuffedBar) statusBars.stuffedLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.soakedLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.soakedLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.soakedBar) statusBars.soakedLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.intoxLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.intoxLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.intoxBar) statusBars.intoxLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.headacheLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.headacheLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.headacheBar) statusBars.headacheLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) statusBars.improveLabel = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "statusBars.improveLabel", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", fgColor = statusBars.labelTextColor, }, statusBars.improveBar) statusBars.improveLabel:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); ]]) -- Bar Styles statusBars.frontBackgroundColor = "QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #98f041, stop: 0.1 #8cf029, stop: 0.49 #66cc00, stop: 0.5 #52a300, stop: 1 #66cc00);" statusBars.backBackgroundColor = "QLinearGradient( x1: 0, y1: 0, x2: 0, y2: 1, stop: 0 #78bd33, stop: 0.1 #6ebd20, stop: 0.49 #4c9900, stop: 0.5 #387000, stop: 1 #4c9900);" statusBars.borderTop = "1px black solid;" statusBars.borderLeft = "1px black solid;" statusBars.borderBottom = "1px black solid;" statusBars.radius = "7;" statusBars.padding = "3px;" statusBars.frontStyle = [[ background-color: ]] .. statusBars.frontBackgroundColor .. [[ border-top: ]] .. statusBars.borderTop .. [[ border-left: ]] .. statusBars.borderLeft .. [[ border-bottom: ]] .. statusBars.borderBottom .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. statusBars.radius .. [[ padding: ]] .. statusBars.padding .. [[ ]] statusBars.backStyle = [[ background-color: ]] .. statusBars.backBackgroundColor .. [[ border-top: ]] .. statusBars.borderTop .. [[ border-left: ]] .. statusBars.borderLeft .. [[ border-bottom: ]] .. statusBars.borderBottom .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. statusBars.radius .. [[ padding: ]] .. statusBars.padding .. [[ ]] function statusBars.setBgColor(bgColor) local barColor = [[ background-color: ]] .. bgColor .. [[ border-top: ]] .. statusBars.borderTop .. [[ border-left: ]] .. statusBars.borderLeft .. [[ border-bottom: ]] .. statusBars.borderBottom .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. statusBars.radius .. [[ padding: ]] .. statusBars.padding .. [[ ]] return barColor end -- Default settings --statusBars.hpBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.frontStyle) --statusBars.hpBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.backStyle) -- Define colors if __STATUS_BARS_COLORFULL__ == true then statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,0,0,100%);" statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,0,0,100%);" statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,90,100%);" statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(220,220,0,100%);" statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,90,0,100%);" statusBars.frontencumbranceBackgroundColor = "rgba(160,160,160,100%);" statusBars.backencumbranceBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,0,90,100%);" statusBars.frontStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,128,0,100%);" statusBars.backStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(102,51,0,100%);" statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,255,255,100%);" statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,51,51,100%);" statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(51,255,51,100%);" statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,102,0,100%);" statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,255,128,100%);" statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,102,51,100%);" statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(127,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(51,0,102,100%);" else -- Define colors statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(255,0,0,100%);" statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,0,0,100%);" statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,255,100%);" statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor = "rgba(0,0,90,100%);" statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(220,220,0,100%);" statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor = "rgba(90,90,0,100%);" statusBars.frontencumbranceBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backencumbranceBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backPanicBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backStuffedBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(180,180,180,100%);" statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor = "rgba(64,64,64,100%);" end -- Set styles statusBars.hpBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontHpBackgroundColor)) statusBars.hpBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backHpBackgroundColor)) statusBars.manaBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontManaBackgroundColor)) statusBars.manaBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backManaBackgroundColor)) statusBars.fatigueBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontFatigueBackgroundColor)) statusBars.fatigueBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backFatigueBackgroundColor)) statusBars.encumbranceBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontencumbranceBackgroundColor)) statusBars.encumbranceBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backencumbranceBackgroundColor)) statusBars.panicBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontPanicBackgroundColor)) statusBars.panicBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backPanicBackgroundColor)) statusBars.stuffedBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontStuffedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.stuffedBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backStuffedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.soakedBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontSoakedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.soakedBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backSoakedBackgroundColor)) statusBars.intoxBar .front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontIntoxBackgroundColor)) statusBars.intoxBar .back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backIntoxBackgroundColor)) statusBars.headacheBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontHeadacheBackgroundColor)) statusBars.headacheBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backHeadacheBackgroundColor)) statusBars.improveBar.front:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.frontImproveBackgroundColor)) statusBars.improveBar.back:setStyleSheet(statusBars.setBgColor(statusBars.backImproveBackgroundColor)) function statusBars.updateStatus() if (gmcp.char.state.hp) then statusBars:updateHp() end if (gmcp.char.state.mana) then statusBars:updateMana() end if (gmcp.char.state.fatigue) then statusBars:updateFatigue() end if (gmcp.char.state.encumbrance) then statusBars:updateencumbrance() end if (gmcp.char.state.panic) then statusBars.updatePanic() end if (gmcp.char.state.stuffed) then statusBars.updateStuffed() end if (gmcp.char.state.soaked) then statusBars.updateSoaked() end if (gmcp.char.state.intox) then statusBars.updateIntox() end if (gmcp.char.state.headache) then statusBars.updateHeadache() end if (gmcp.char.state.improve) then statusBars.updateImprove() end end function statusBars.updateHp() local currentHp = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.hp) local maxHp = 6 local statusStr = "Kondycja: " if (currentHp == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ledwo zywy" elseif (currentHp == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ciezko ranny" elseif (currentHp == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w zlej kondycji" elseif (currentHp == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ranny" elseif (currentHp == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko ranny" elseif (currentHp == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w dobrym stanie" elseif (currentHp == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w swietnej kondycji" end statusBars.hpBar:setValue(currentHp, maxHp) statusBars.hpLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateMana() local currentMana = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.mana) local maxMana = 8 local statusStr = "Mana: " if (currentMana == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "u kresu sil" elseif (currentMana == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wykonczony" elseif (currentMana == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wyczerpany" elseif (currentMana == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w zlej kondycji" elseif (currentMana == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo zmeczony" elseif (currentMana == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "zmeczony" elseif (currentMana == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "oslabiony" elseif (currentMana == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko oslabiony" elseif (currentMana == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w pelni sil" end statusBars.manaBar:setValue(currentMana, maxMana) statusBars.manaLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateFatigue() local currentFatigue = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.fatigue) local maxFatigue = 9 local statusStr = "Zmeczenie: " if (currentFatigue == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "w pelni wypoczety" elseif (currentFatigue == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wypoczety" elseif (currentFatigue == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "troche zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo zmeczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieco wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo wyczerpany" elseif (currentFatigue == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wycienczony" elseif (currentFatigue == 9) then statusStr = statusStr .. "calkowicie wycienczony" end --statusBars.fatigueBar:setValue(currentFatigue, maxFatigue, ""..statusStr.."") statusBars.fatigueBar:setValue(currentFatigue, maxFatigue) statusBars.fatigueLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateencumbrance() local currentencumbrance = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.encumbrance) local maxencumbrance = 6 local statusStr = "Eq: " if (currentencumbrance == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "brak obc." elseif (currentencumbrance == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wadzi ci troche" elseif (currentencumbrance == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "daje ci sie we znaki" elseif (currentencumbrance == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest dosyc klopotliwy" elseif (currentencumbrance == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest wyjatkowo ciezki" elseif (currentencumbrance == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "jest niemilosiernie ciezki" elseif (currentencumbrance == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "prawie przygniata cie do ziemi" end statusBars.encumbranceBar:setValue(currentencumbrance, maxencumbrance) statusBars.encumbranceLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updatePanic() local currentPanic = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.panic) local maxPanic = 5 local statusStr = "Strach: " if (currentPanic == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bezpiecznie" elseif (currentPanic == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "spokojnie" elseif (currentPanic == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieswojo" elseif (currentPanic == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nerwowo" elseif (currentPanic == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "przerazony" elseif (currentPanic == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo przerazony" end statusBars.panicBar:setValue(currentPanic, maxPanic) statusBars.panicLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateStuffed() local currentStuffed = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.stuffed) local maxStuffed = 3 local statusStr = "Glod: " if (currentStuffed == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo glody" elseif (currentStuffed == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "glodny" elseif (currentStuffed == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "najedzony" elseif (currentStuffed == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo najedzony" end statusBars.stuffedBar:setValue(maxStuffed - currentStuffed, maxStuffed) statusBars.stuffedLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateSoaked() local currentSoaked = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.soaked) local maxSoaked = 3 local statusStr = "Pragnienie: " if (currentSoaked == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "chce si sie bardzo pic" elseif (currentSoaked == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "chce ci sie pic" elseif (currentSoaked == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "troche chce ci sie pic" elseif (currentSoaked == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nie chce ci sie pic" end statusBars.soakedBar:setValue(maxSoaked - currentSoaked, maxSoaked) statusBars.soakedLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateIntox() local currentIntox = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.intox) local maxIntox = 9 local statusStr = "Upicie: " if (currentIntox == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "trzezwy" elseif (currentIntox == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "podchmielony" elseif (currentIntox == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekko podpity" elseif (currentIntox == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wstawiony" elseif (currentIntox == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "mocno wstawiony" elseif (currentIntox == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "pijany" elseif (currentIntox == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "schlany" elseif (currentIntox == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "napruty" elseif (currentIntox == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nawalony" elseif (currentIntox == 9) then statusStr = statusStr .. "pijany jak bela" end statusBars.intoxBar:setValue(currentIntox, maxIntox) statusBars.intoxLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateHeadache() local currentHeadache = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.headache) local maxHeadache = 6 local statusStr = "Kac: " if (currentHeadache == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "brak kaca" elseif (currentHeadache == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "lekki" elseif (currentHeadache == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "niemily" elseif (currentHeadache == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "drazniacy" elseif (currentHeadache == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "niezly" elseif (currentHeadache == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "straszliwy" elseif (currentHeadache == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "potworny" end statusBars.headacheBar:setValue(currentHeadache, maxHeadache) statusBars.headacheLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end function statusBars.updateImprove() local currentImprove = tonumber(gmcp.char.state.improve) local maxImprove = 15 local statusStr = "Postepy: " if (currentImprove == 0) then statusStr = statusStr .. "brak" elseif (currentImprove == 1) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieznaczne" elseif (currentImprove == 2) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo male" elseif (currentImprove == 3) then statusStr = statusStr .. "male" elseif (currentImprove == 4) then statusStr = statusStr .. "nieduze" elseif (currentImprove == 5) then statusStr = statusStr .. "zadowalajace" elseif (currentImprove == 6) then statusStr = statusStr .. "spore" elseif (currentImprove == 7) then statusStr = statusStr .. "dosc duze" elseif (currentImprove == 8) then statusStr = statusStr .. "znaczne" elseif (currentImprove == 9) then statusStr = statusStr .. "duze" elseif (currentImprove == 10) then statusStr = statusStr .. "bardzo duze" elseif (currentImprove == 11) then statusStr = statusStr .. "ogromne" elseif (currentImprove == 12) then statusStr = statusStr .. "imponujace" elseif (currentImprove == 13) then statusStr = statusStr .. "wspaniale" elseif (currentImprove == 14) then statusStr = statusStr .. "gigantyczne" elseif (currentImprove == 15) then statusStr = statusStr .. "niebotyczne" end statusBars.improveBar:setValue(currentImprove, maxImprove) statusBars.improveLabel:echo("
" .. statusStr .. "
") end -- Update status (Event) function statusBarsScript() statusBars.updateStatus() end

Script.name: battleCompassScript
Script.script:
-- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- battleCompass = battleCompass or {} battleCompass.runTable = { } battleCompass.back = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.back", --x = "-32%", x = "-10%", y = "35%", width = "10%", height = "10%", }, main) -- Create 3x3 grid battleCompass.box = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "battleCompass.box", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },battleCompass.back) battleCompass.row1 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "battleCompass.row1", },battleCompass.box) battleCompass.row2 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "battleCompass.row2", },battleCompass.box) battleCompass.row3 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "battleCompass.row3", },battleCompass.box) -- Add 9 labels for every battleCompass direction battleCompass.msgFormatLeft = "
" battleCompass.msgFormaRight = "
" battleCompass.nw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.nw", --message = " " .. battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight .. " ", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row1) battleCompass.w = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.w", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "W" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row1) battleCompass.sw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.sw", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "SW" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row1) battleCompass.n = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.n", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "N" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row2) battleCompass.center = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.center", },battleCompass.row2) battleCompass.s = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.s", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "S" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row2) battleCompass.ne = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.ne", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "NE" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row3) battleCompass.e = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.e", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "E" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row3) battleCompass.se = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "battleCompass.se", message = battleCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "SE" .. battleCompass.msgFormaRight, },battleCompass.row3) function battleCompass.refreshLabels() local exits = battleCompass.runTable if __IS_CHASING__ == true then battleCompass:centerOn() else battleCompass:centerOff() end if exits == nil then battleCompass:nwOff() battleCompass:nOff() battleCompass:neOff() battleCompass:eOff() battleCompass:seOff() battleCompass:sOff() battleCompass:swOff() battleCompass:wOff() return end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-zachod") then battleCompass:nwOn() else battleCompass:nwOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnoc") then battleCompass:nOn() else battleCompass:nOff() end if table.contains(exits, "polnocny-wschod") then battleCompass:neOn() else battleCompass:neOff() end if table.contains(exits, "wschod") then battleCompass:eOn() else battleCompass:eOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-wschod") then battleCompass:seOn() else battleCompass:seOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludnie") then battleCompass:sOn() else battleCompass:sOff() end if table.contains(exits, "poludniowy-zachod") then battleCompass:swOn() else battleCompass:swOff() end if table.contains(exits, "zachod") then battleCompass:wOn() else battleCompass:wOff() end end function battleCompassScript() -- changing room should refresh the table battleCompass.runTable = { } battleCompass:resize() battleCompass:refreshLabels() end function battleCompass.resize() battleCompass.back:resize(battleCompass.back:get_height(),battleCompass.back:get_height()) end -- set styles battleCompass.borderWidth = "1px;" battleCompass.borderStyle = "solid;" battleCompass.borderRadius = "1px;" battleCompass.bgOnColor = "rgba(90,0,0,100%);" battleCompass.borderOnColor = "rgba(120,0,0,100%);" battleCompass.bgOffColor = "rgba(30,0,0,100%);" battleCompass.borderOffColor = "rgba(30,0,0,100%);" battleCompass.styleOn = [[ background-color: ]] .. battleCompass.bgOnColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. battleCompass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. battleCompass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. battleCompass.borderOnColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. battleCompass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] battleCompass.styleOff = [[ background-color: ]] .. battleCompass.bgOffColor .. [[ border-width: ]] .. battleCompass.borderWidth .. [[ border-style: ]] .. battleCompass.borderStyle .. [[ border-color: ]] .. battleCompass.borderOffColor .. [[ border-radius: ]] .. battleCompass.borderRadius .. [[ ]] -- On ------------------------------------ function battleCompass.nwOn() --battleCompass.n:setColor(0, 255, 0) battleCompass.nw:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) --battleCompass.nw:echo("NW", nil, "c") end function battleCompass.nOn() battleCompass.n:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) --battleCompass.n:echo("N", nil, "c") end function battleCompass.neOn() battleCompass.ne:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.eOn() battleCompass.e:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.seOn() battleCompass.se:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.sOn() battleCompass.s:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.swOn() battleCompass.sw:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.wOn() battleCompass.w:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end function battleCompass.centerOn() battleCompass.w:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOn) end -- Off ------------------------------------ function battleCompass.nwOff() battleCompass.nw:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.nOff() battleCompass.n:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.neOff() battleCompass.ne:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.eOff() battleCompass.e:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.seOff() battleCompass.se:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.sOff() battleCompass.s:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.swOff() battleCompass.sw:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.wOff() battleCompass.w:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end function battleCompass.centerOff() battleCompass.center:setStyleSheet(battleCompass.styleOff) end

Script.name: arrivalCompassScript

-- Copyright 2015 Filip Cyrus Bober. ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- arrivalCompass = arrivalCompass or {} arrivalCompass.arrivalTable = { } arrivalCompass.back = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.back", --x = "-32%", x = "-20%", y = "35%", width = "10%", height = "10%", }, main) -- Create 3x3 grid arrivalCompass.box = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.box", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", },arrivalCompass.back) arrivalCompass.row1 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.row1", },arrivalCompass.box) arrivalCompass.row2 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.row2", },arrivalCompass.box) arrivalCompass.row3 = Geyser.VBox:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.row3", },arrivalCompass.box) -- Add 9 labels for every arrivalCompass direction arrivalCompass.msgFormatLeft = "
" arrivalCompass.msgFormaRight = "
" arrivalCompass.nw = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "arrivalCompass.nw", --message = " " .. arrivalCompass.msgFormatLeft .. "NW" .. arrivalCompass.msgFormaRight .. " ", message = arrivalCompass.msgFormatLeft ..
